description: Adversaries may stop services or processes in order to conduct Data Destruction or Data Encrypted for Impact on the data stores of services like Exchange and SQL Server.
name: Disable Important Scheduled Task
query: (process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:*\/Change* AND process.command_line:*\/TN* AND process.command_line:*\/disable* AND process.command_line:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\SystemRestore\\SR*)
author: frack113
